title: This is probably what Twitter’s long-awaited edit button will look like on Android [Updated]
content:
The community of Twitter has been asking for the ability to edit typos and other errors in tweets for years, and finally the social network confirmed an edit button was coming. Now, we’ve been able to uncover an early look.

more…

The post This is probably what Twitter’s long-awaited edit button will look like on Android [Updated] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ahead of the feature’s formal launch, we’ve been able to get an early first look at Twitter’s edit button, though it doesn’t work yet.
